forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a pleasant and sunny morning greets you, with the gentle warmth of the sun slowly chasing away the morning chill. The air feels crisp, imbued with that signature hint of sea and earth, as a west-southwest wind, brisk and invigorating, dances through the streets. As the day unfolds, temperatures will gracefully dip just a touch; a slight, refreshing breeze will accompany your afternoon wanderings, creating a comfortable atmosphere for outdoor pursuits.

Tonight, an embrace of partly cloudy skies will blanket the city, offering a serene respite as the evening sets in. With the low temperatures inviting a light layer, reaching for a sweater would be wise. As for activities, one might find joy in a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps pausing to savor the vibrant energy of the waterfront, or joining friends for a quiet gathering at a local café, where laughter mingles with the aroma of coffee and pastries. The conditions beckon you to step outside and bask in the simple pleasures of the day, each breeze a reminder of nature's gentle rhythm.
